text: وَلَئِنْ أَذَقْنَـٰهُ نَعْمَآءَ بَعْدَ ضَرَّآءَ مَسَّتْهُ لَيَقُولَنَّ ذَهَبَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتُ عَنِّىٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَفَرِحٌ فَخُورٌ

translation.en.sahih: But if We give him a taste of favor after hardship has touched him, he will surely say, "Bad times have left me." Indeed, he is exultant and boastful -
translation.id.indonesian: Dan jika Kami rasakan kepadanya kebahagiaan sesudah bencana yang menimpanya, niscaya dia akan berkata: "Telah hilang bencana-bencana itu daripadaku"; sesungguhnya dia sangat gembira lagi bangga,
